data.title: Government
data.meta_description: Scott County Departments If you wish you contact a department or office by email, you may use our convenient contact form. Please attempt to contact the appropriate department. If you are unsure of the correct department, call the county receptionist at (563) 326-8611. Click on department name for department webpage. General Inquiries 563-326-8611 Administration Office
data.text:
Scott County Departments

If you wish you contact a department or office by email, you may use our convenient contact form.

Please attempt to contact the appropriate department.

If you are unsure of the correct department, call the county receptionist at (563) 326-8611.

Click on department name for department webpage.

General Inquiries

Anyone in Scott County, IA, needing shelter due to the current flooding or last night’s storm damages is encouraged to call the American Red Cross directly at 1-800-Red-Cross (1-800-733-2767).

The Scott County Conservation Board has approved a special deer hunt for archery hunters only from October 1, 2024 through January 10, 2025 at Scott County Park. This hunt is only for residents of Iowa. Applications are now available and need to be returned no later than Wednesday, July 31st, 2024...
